    • Constructor Detail

      • SQLDataFeed

        public SQLDataFeed(java.lang.String n,
           java.lang.Long i,
           java.sql.Date f,
           SQLHelper srcDB,
           java.lang.String[] srcTab,
           java.lang.String[] srcCols,
           SQLHelper dstDB,
           java.lang.String[] dstTab,
           java.lang.String[] dstCols)
        Default constructor to create a SQLDataFeed from the source database to the destination database.
        Parameters:
        n - the name of this Job.
        i - the interval in ms between executions of this Job.
        f - the Date of this job's first execution.
        srcDB - the source database's connection helper.
        srcTab - the source tables of interest in srcDB.
        srcCols - the names of the source columns of interest in srcTab.
        dstDB - the destination database's connection helper.
        dstTab - the destination tables of interest in dstDB.
        dstCols - the names of the destination columns of interest in dstTab.

      • SQLDataFeed

        public SQLDataFeed(java.lang.String n,
           java.lang.Long i,
           java.sql.Date f,
           java.lang.String srcDBServer,
           java.lang.String srcDBName,
           java.lang.String srcUser,
           java.lang.String srcPass,
           java.lang.String[] srcTab,
           java.lang.String[] srcCols,
           java.lang.String dstDBServer,
           java.lang.String dstDBName,
           java.lang.String dstUser,
           java.lang.String dstPass,
           java.lang.String[] dstTab,
           java.lang.String[] dstCols)
        Constructor to create a SQLDataFeed from the source database to the destination database.
        Parameters:
        n - the name of this Job.
        i - the interval in ms between executions of this Job.
        f - the Date of this job's first execution.
        srcDBServer - the source database server name or IP address.
        srcDBName - the source database name.
        srcUser - the source username.
        srcPass - the source password.
        srcTab - the source tables of interest in srcDB.
        srcCols - the names of the source columns of interest in srcTab.
        dstDBServer - the destination database server name or IP address.
        dstDBName - the destination database name.
        dstUser - the destination username.
        dstPass - the destination password.
        dstDB - the destination database's connection helper.
        dstTab - the destination tables of interest in dstDB.
        dstCols - the names of the destination columns of interest in dstTab.

        Run this Job if the next schedule run time has come (or passed).
